body.name: Bactine MAX First Aid Spray - Pain Relief Cleansing Spray with 4% Lidocaine - Numbing Lidocaine Spray Kills 99.9% of Germs - Pain + Itch Relief For Minor Cuts & Scrapes, Burns & Bug Bites - 5 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 14 mins
features: MAX RELIEF FOR PAIN & ITCH: Bactine Max is an all-in-one cleansing spray that cools and relieves pain & itch from minor cuts, scrapes, burns, bug bites & sunburn - Formulated with 4% lidocaine, the maximum amount allowed for OTC topical anesthetic

KILLS 99% OF GERMS: Feel confident that you are protected. Bactine Max's main ingredient is benzalkonium chloride which stops bacterial microorganism growth on the skin & effectively kills 99% of germs associated with skin infections

NO-STING & NO WORRIES: Treat your family with a sting-free first aid wound care. Unlike other hydrogen peroxide or alcohol based wound care products, Bactine cleanses and protects minor wounds, bug bites, and burns without a painful, harsh sting

FIRST AID KIT MUST HAVE: Accidents happen, be prepared. Keep your first aid kit stocked with Bactine Max. Whether it’s a scraped knee, blistered heel or itchy bug bite, this itch and pain relief spray provides cooling relief where you need it most

TRUSTED FOR OVER 70 YEARS: With a legacy spanning over 70 years, Bactine has been the go-to choice for families seeking the best first aid available. Clean affected area; spray a small amount 1-3 times daily; may be covered with a sterile bandage
body.description: Bactine maximum pain relieving cleansing spray can be used as first aid to help prevent bacterial contamination or skin infection. Relieves the pain of minor cuts, scrapes and burns on contact, maximum strength antiseptic to kill germs, does not sting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick Relief for Pain and Wounds
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Bactine Max Pain Relieving Antiseptic Spray, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations on multiple levels. This product is an absolute game-changer when it comes to pain relief and wound care. Whether it's minor cuts, scrapes, or insect bites, Bactine Max has proven to be a reliable and effective solution.First and foremost, the pain relief aspect of this spray is exceptional. Upon application, the cooling sensation is instant, which provides quick and noticeable relief from discomfort. The combination of pain relief and antiseptic properties creates a soothing effect, making it suitable for both adults and children alike. Having used various pain relief sprays in the past, I can confidently say that Bactine Max stands out as one of the most effective options I've come across.The antiseptic properties of this spray are equally impressive. Bactine Max not only numbs the pain but also helps prevent infection in minor wounds. This is especially valuable when dealing with outdoor injuries, as it provides peace of mind knowing that the affected area is being protected from potential bacteria and contaminants.Another aspect that impressed me is the ease of application. The spray nozzle works flawlessly, dispensing just the right amount of product without any wastage. The compact and portable design of the bottle also makes it convenient to carry in my bag during outdoor activities, ensuring that relief is always within reach.Furthermore, I appreciate that Bactine Max does not leave any sticky residue or strong lingering scent like some other antiseptic sprays. It dries quickly and leaves the skin feeling refreshed, which is a significant plus for me.The versatility of Bactine Max is worth mentioning as well. While it excels at providing immediate relief for cuts and scrapes, I have also used it for soothing insect bites and even minor burns, with excellent results every time.In conclusion, Bactine Max Pain Relieving Antiseptic Spray has proven to be a highly effective, reliable, and convenient solution for pain relief and wound care. Its fast-acting formula, combined with antiseptic properties, makes it a must-have in any first aid kit. Whether you are an outdoor enthusiast, a parent, or simply someone looking for quick pain relief, I wholeheartedly recommend Bactine Max. This product has earned its place as a trusted companion in my household, and I will continue to rely on it for immediate relief and care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use. Well worth the money but keep your expectations realistic for bug bites
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bactine Max Pain Relieving Antiseptic Spray with Lidocaine and I am so glad I did! This product is instantly soothes and relieves minor cuts, scrapes, and burns, and it also relieves itchy skin caused by insect bites and rashes. It contains lidocaine which numbs pain quickly and it also has antiseptic properties that help to prevent infection. The spray is easy to use and it does not sting or cause any discomfort. If you get it for bug bites, it does reduce the itch but only a little bit. Don't expect the itch to go away. It sooths it for a few minutes but then the itch comes back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I forgot about this stuff there is 4% lidocaine in it so it doesn’t sting when you spray it on cuts or wounds that’s nice to have when you have kids and I like how there’s a child safety cap on it.
